body_html: No problem @aojue1109 glad it worked. Just the same logic - to make sure the layers and callbacks etc. are imported from the eras implementation in tensorflow. I wrote an article about Freezing a Keras model, where one method uses the model_to_estimator method if you'd like more information.

body: No problem @aojue1109 glad it worked. Just the same logic - to make sure the layers and callbacks etc. are imported from the eras implementation in tensorflow. I wrote an article about [Freezing a Keras model](https://towardsdatascience.com/freezing-a-keras-model-c2e26cb84a38), where one method uses the `model_to_estimator` method if you'd like more information.
